sub_topic: Identifying the isomorphism between two graphs.
message_1: Given two graphs G and H, where G has 6 vertices and 8 edges, and H has 6 vertices and 7 edges, determine if G and H are isomorphic. If they are isomorphic, provide the mapping between the vertices of the two graphs.
message_2: Since G has 8 edges and H has 7 edges, they have a different number of edges. Two graphs can only be isomorphic if they have the same number of vertices and the same number of edges. Therefore, G and H are not isomorphic, and there is no mapping between the vertices of the two graphs.
